评论详情: This was perfect for my Medusa costume. Got lots of compliments and I sent the link to a couple people at the Halloween party. Cant wait to try out the other two colors I got of this!

I loved the color of the stone and Victorian style. The chain it comes on has a cheap feel and it is hard to clasp. Great price point so I will replace the chain with a velvet cord with clasp to make it a little longer and easier to clasp. Overall very pretty for the price.

Yeah it was only 9.99 but I didn’t expect it to look and feel like a toy. I would return it but I’m wearing it for Wicked dress up, after it will go in the garbage. If you’re buying it as a nice piece of costume jewelry to wear out, don’t buy it.

评论详情: I got this for a goth princess peach costume. I wanted to go with purple instead of blue for the brooch she wears. Unfortunately, I couldn't even try it on as the pendant does not come on the necklace, and I couldn't get the clasp open (it seems like there's so spring - I started to chip the pain from how hard I was trying to open the clasp). Quality of the chain is very poor if I can't even unclasp it to put it on. I had to order a separate black chain in order to use the pendant as intended.
The pendant is a nice inexpensive jewelry addition for my gothic Halloween costumes. The chain clasp is broken so I had to find a different necklace. Would not order again.
It's soooo cute! I returned it bc i no longer needed it after ordering so i didn't wear it 😢 but it's worth the buy fs
